announcements_message: Announcements appear on the home screen of §6§lApps§r.  You can create new posts or edit/delete existing posts here.
announcement_created_message: Your announcement has been created, you can see it on your home screen now!
announcement_updated_message: Your announcement has been updated, you can see your changes on your home screen now!,
announcement_deleted_message: Your announcement has been deleted, it has been removed from everyone's feed.
post_title_message: The title of your post. This support's color codes and Placeholder API.
post_message_message: The message of your post. This will open a custom editor so you can write messages longer than Minecraft's chat limit.
enable_cta_message: Add a "Call to Action" button to your post. This button will appear in the bottom right of your post and will run the command you set in this editor when clicked. You can also customize the CTA's message.
cta_text_message: Set the CTA's text. This support's color codes and Placeholder API.
cta_action_message: Add a command that will run when a player clicks the CTA. This support's Placeholder API
cta_action_type_message: Choose who will run the CTA command when pressed. You can choose between the player who clicked on the CTA or the server. Choosing the server will let you run a command even if the player doesn't have permission to do so.
missing_title_error_message: You need to set a title first!
missing_message_error_message: You need to set a message first!
missing_cta_text_error_message: You need to set the CTA text first or disable the CTA!
missing_cta_action_error_message: You need to set the CTA action first or disable the CTA!
